meanings.definition: The state or quality of being lofty in height or stature.
meanings.sent2: The loftiness of the skyscraper impressed everyone.
meanings.sent3: The tiny squirrel admired the loftiness of the tall tree.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams reached the loftiness of the stars.
meanings.sent5: The loftiness of the castle made it seem like a fairy tale setting.

meanings.definition: The quality of being noble or exalted in character.
meanings.sent1: His loftiness in helping others was truly admirable.
meanings.sent2: The loftiness of her actions inspired those around her.
meanings.sent3: The cat's loftiness in ignoring the toy mouse was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness reached a level of loftiness that was unmatched.
meanings.sent5: The loftiness of his spirit shone through in every gesture.

meanings.definition: The quality of being elevated in thought or style.
meanings.sent1: The loftiness of his ideas challenged conventional thinking.
meanings.sent2: Her writing had a certain loftiness that captivated readers.
meanings.sent3: The loftiness of the fashion show left everyone in awe.
meanings.sent4: His speech reached a level of loftiness that resonated with the audience.
meanings.sent5: The loftiness of her artistry was evident in every brushstroke.
